```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('./man/code/plot.R')
source('./man/code/utils.R')
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "../figures/GCD-"
)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(dev = 'svg')
p = RATIONAL_FRACTION_PRECISION
```

## P1

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
P1 = c(60) %>% hrep::sparse_fr_spectrum(num_harmonics=10)
f = P1 %>% hrep::freq()
f
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
f0 = gcd(f, p)$gcd
f0
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
f0 / min(f)
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
gcd(f/min(f), p)
```

## M3

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
M3 = c(60, 64) %>% hrep::sparse_fr_spectrum(num_harmonics=10)
f = M3 %>% hrep::freq()
f
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
f0 = gcd(f, p)$gcd
f0
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
f0 / min(f)
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
gcd(f/min(f), p)
```
